description: Values of m, the main key or generating number for Pythagorean triangles in which S (the odd short leg) and U (the hypotenuse) are twin primes.
crossrefs: Cf. A051892. See A051642 for the S's, A051859 for the U's and A051858 for the T's (the even long leg).
author: Stuart M. Ellerstein (ellerstein(AT)aol.com), Dec 17 1999
